data.name: Speedrun
data.detailed_description:
About speedrun
Speedrun is a 2D platform game that you can jump, dash and move to dodge a dangerous spike that can kill you. You have to survive a dangerous underground city with your special movement!

About the game play
You will use a dash movement to go places that you will not able to go with the normal movement skills. and Also you can use a jump and move to have additional support in your movement.
data.about_the_game:
About speedrun

About the game play
You will use a dash movement to go places that you will not able to go with the normal movement skills. and Also you can use a jump and move to have additional support in your movement.
data.short_description: You're trapped in underground cities! Run and use your special dash movement to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intal(R) core(TM) i7-4900 CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Storage: 55 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
